Hardware

View the schematic and footprint in PDF format.

Main components

  1. PCB (1x)
  2. WeMos D1 Mini v3.0.0 (1x)
  3. WeMos Battery shield v1.1.0 (1x)
  4. LiPo 1200mAh battery with JST PH2 connector (1x)
  5. M2 nuts (4x)
  6. M2 spacers 15mm height (4x)

Connect pins A0 and positive + terminal of the LiPo JST connector on the battery shield with a 100k ohm resistor.
